name: AccessCapture
description: AccessCapture: Developed by HPS. A Chrome extension to take and manipulate screenshots of the active tab, and inspect elements on a webpage.

get-element.description: Capture and copy a screenshot of the focused element to the clipboard

screenshot-element.description: Capture and copy a screenshot of the entire visible tab to the clipboard

inspect-element.description: Inspect the HTML of the focused element on the page
